text: The 1st Annual Gotham Independent Film Awards, presented by the Independent Filmmaker Project, were held on September 30, 1991. At the ceremony hosted by Charles Grodin, Irwin Young was honored with a Career Tribute with Jonathan Demme, John Turturro, Richard Price, Ernest Dickerson and Michael Hausman receiving the other individual awards. ==Winners== ===Breakthrough Director (Open Palm Award)=== Jennie Livingston – Paris Is Burning ===Filmmaker Award=== Jonathan Demme ===Actor Award=== John Turturro ===Writer Award=== Richard Price ===Below-the-Line Award=== Ernest Dickerson, cinematographer ===Producer/Industry Executive Award=== Michael Hausman ===Career Tribute=== Irwin Young ==References== ==External links== * 1991 Category:1991 film awards
title: Gotham Independent Film Awards 1991
